closeOnAction.description: Whether to return to the position automatically when the operation button is clicked
closeOnAction.description_zh: Whether to return to the position automatically when the operation button is clicked

closeOnTouchOutside.description: Whether to return to the position automatically when other areas is clicked
closeOnTouchOutside.description_zh: Whether to return to the position automatically when other areas is clicked

leftActions.description: List of operation buttons on the left
leftActions.description_zh: List of operation buttons on the left

rightActions.description: List of operation buttons on the right
rightActions.description_zh: List of operation buttons on the right

stopPropagation.description: Stop the propagation of some events.
stopPropagation.description_zh: Stop the propagation of some events.

events.name: onAction
events.description: Triggered when operation button is clicked
events.description_zh: Triggered when operation button is clicked

events.name: onActionsReveal
events.description: Triggered when the operation button appears completely
events.description_zh: Triggered when the operation button appears completely

methods.name: close
methods.description: Let the slide bar return to the position
methods.description_zh: Let the slide bar return to the position

methods.name: show
methods.description: Slide out the operation button, the side parameter defaults to right
methods.description_zh: Slide out the operation button, the side parameter defaults to right
